mapper.select:
SELECT a.ID id, a.NAME name, a.PHONE_NUMBER phoneNumber, a.LANDLINE_NUMBER landlineNumber, a.WEIXIN_ID weixinId, a.IDENTITY_CARD identityCard, a.GENDER gender, a.ADDRESS address, a.AREA_CODE areaCode, c.NAME areaName, a.EMAIL email, a.QQ qq, a.INITIALS_CODE initialsCode, a.SPELLING_CODE spellingCode, a.SERVICE_SHOP_CODE shopCode, b.NAME shopName, a.AGE age, a.AGE_SECTION ageSection, a.WHETHER_HAVE_CAR whetherHaveCar, a.IS_INTEREST isInterest, a.PASSWORD password, a.LOGIN_NAME loginName, a.VERSION version, a.LOGIN_FREQUENCY loginFrequency, a.CREATE_DATE createDate from tf_customer_info a left join tf_shop_info b on b.shop_code = a.service_shop_code left join tf_area_info c on c.code = a.area_code
1=1
AND (substring(a.PHONE_NUMBER,8,11) like '%${phoneNumber}' or a.PHONE_NUMBER = #{phoneNumber})
AND a.SERVICE_SHOP_CODE = #{shopCode}

select a.ID id, a.NAME name, a.PHONE_NUMBER phoneNumber, a.AREA_CODE areaCode, a.SERVICE_SHOP_CODE shopCode, a.TYPE type, a.REMARK remark, a.PROVIDER_ID providerId, b.NAME providerName from tf_express_service_provider_contacts a left join tf_express_service_provider_info b on b.ID = a.PROVIDER_ID where a.PHONE_NUMBER = #{phoneNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TF_EXPRESS_SERVICE_PROVIDER_CONTACTS( ID, NAME, PHONE_NUMBER, AREA_CODE, SERVICE_SHOP_CODE, `TYPE`, REMARK, PROVIDER_ID ) VALUES ( nextval('seq_express_service_provider_contacts_id'), #{name}, #{phoneNumber}, #{areaCode}, #{shopCode}, #{type}, #{remark}, #{providerId} )
